Challenge

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Challenge.Game

  • class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game is used to render Chips Challenge. We render the entire level with this class.
    Version:
    9001
    Author:
    Everyone basically

      • calculateOffSet

        private Position calculateOffSet(Level level,
                                 javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas)
        Calculates the offset for when you draw the game.
        Parameters:
        level - The current level.
        canvas - The canvas used for the game.
        Returns:
        The offset for the x coordinate and y coordinate as a pair represented by a int[].
